description: Deploy and manage applications on the attached device.

commands.name: az sphere device sideload delete
commands.summary: Delete applications from the attached device.
examples: az sphere device sideload delete --component-id d2d461c4-b870-4619-b207-e86b8ab1481c
az sphere device sideload delete --except-component-ids d2d461c4-b870-4619-b207-e86b8ab1481c 683520b6-df43-4f4f-a4de-4c7a6f2ad05d

commands.name: az sphere device sideload deploy
commands.summary: Deploy an application to the attached device.
commands.syntax:
az sphere device sideload deploy --image-package
                                 [--device]
                                 [--force {false, true}]
                                 [--manual-start {false, true}]
examples: az sphere device sideload deploy --image-package MyImage.imagepackage
az sphere device sideload deploy --image-package MyImage.imagepackage --manual-start
az sphere device sideload deploy --image-package MyImage.imagepackage --device <DeviceIdValue>
